properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 4:39PM MST until February 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations
of 1 to 3 inches. North winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Custer, Fallon, Powder River and Carter counties.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult due to snow, gusty winds
and areas of blowing snow. Roadways impacted include I-94 from
Miles City east and US Highway 7 from Baker to Ekalaka.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of falling temperatures
and gusty north winds will cause wind chills to fall well below
zero Wednesday afternoon and evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY
